title: BC Jindal Group enters renewable energy sector with $2.5 bn investment
description: BC Jindal Group announces its entry into India's renewable energy sector with a plan to invest $2.5 billion over the next five years. The group aims to generate 5 GW of renewable power and manufacture photovoltaic cells and modules, leveraging its existing power generation capabilities.
